TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InnerJoinExpression extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.SqlExpressions.PredicateJoinExpressionBase

summary.para: An expression that represents an INNER JOIN in a SQL tree.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.summary: Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children. If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
Docs.returns: This expression if no children changed, or an expression with the updated children.
